alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 04 at 4:34PM AKST until March 06 at 1:00AM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM SATURDAY TO 1 AM AKST SUNDAY FOR THE ANCHORAGE HILLSIDE... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches on the Hillside. * WHERE...Anchorage Hillside. * WHEN...From 6 AM Saturday to 1 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will begin Saturday morning and will fall steadily into the evening. The snow will linger at higher elevations as winds shift out of the northwest Saturday night. The Anchorage Bowl can expect 3 to 5 inches of accumulation on Saturday. Daytime heating should keep the roads mostly wet in the Bowl for the first part of the storm except where pockets of heavier snow develop. There is a greater chance of some accumulation on the roads beginning after dark.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
